cards.name: Beneath the Bridge of Dream
cards.text: Shadow (0). Interrupt: When you choose a plot card to reveal in the plot phase, instead shuffle your used pile into your plot deck and choose a plot card to reveal at random. Until the end of the round, increase the gold value on your revealed plot card by 2.

cards.name: Ser Gerris Drinkwater
cards.text: Renown. Shadow (5). Reaction: After Ser Gerris Drinkwater comes out of shadows, choose a card in your plot deck and switch it with a card in your used pile.

cards.name: The Shadow City
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reduce the cost to marshal each of your cards into shadows by 1. Challenges Action: Kneel The Shadow City and discard 1 card from shadows to draw 2 cards.
